titles.title: Honoring Christina Taylor Green for giving the gift of life with organ donation and encouraging Americans to join her call to make organ donation a personal choice.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

term.name: Organ and tissue donation and transplantation

bill.summary: 1/25/2011--Introduced. Honors Christina Taylor Green for giving the gift of life with organ donation.Encourages Americans to join her call to make organ donation a personal choice.
